 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רוּת‎</span> **proper name, feminine** ==Ruth== (for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רְעוּת‎</span>, i.e. ***friendship***, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>BN 84, 156; Or. ii. 41</sup> [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>ii. 1. 481</sup>); — Moabitess, ancestress of David, [[Ruth.1.4|Ruth 1:4]]; [[Ruth.1.14|Ruth 1:14]]; [[Ruth.1.16|Ruth 1:16]]; [[Ruth.1.22|Ruth 1:22]]; [[Ruth.2.2|Ruth 2:2]]; [[Ruth.2.8|Ruth 2:8]]; [[Ruth.2.21|Ruth 2:21]]; [[Ruth.2.22|Ruth 2:22]]; [[Ruth.3.9|Ruth 3:9]]; [[Ruth.4.5|Ruth 4:5]]; [[Ruth.4.10|Ruth 4:10]]; [[Ruth.4.13|Ruth 4:13]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">Ρουθ</span>.
